TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityWithChangeTracker

Docs.summary: Defines an entity type that implements change tracking.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An entity type must implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithChangeTracker> to track changes. <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> is the base class for all entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools. <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithChangeTracker>.
Object Services provides objects with a reference to an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> interface to enable objects to report changes. Methods on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> are used to report changes.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetChangeTracker(class System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker changeTracker) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the used to report changes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Methods on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> are used by <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> to report changes.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
